page.shortlink: api reporting namespace report generator class
page.description: Report text generator (used to generate HTML, plaintext ang RTF)

property.name: persisted
property.description: Type "C". internal persisted state - none, connection, instance. This is used for report objects that stay around, which is not typically the case with web applications where the object lives only as long as the web request.

property.name: contents
property.description: Type "C". Generated contents of report (if generating to string)

property.name: toc
property.description: Type "C". Generated table of contents for report.

property.name: ReportObjectResources
property.description: Type "ReportObjectResources". Generated bitmaps etc for HTML reports.

property.name: Arguments
property.description: Type "SQL::Arguments". SQL arguments to pass to report.

property.name: cachePrefix
property.description: Type "C". Internal unique cache id - used to manage cached lookups - useful when optimizing paginated reports.
